subject: Basketball
Knees
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: There may be visible cringing in Phoenix on Friday night, when Amar’e Stoudemire, whom the Suns let go because of his knee, makes his first appearance as a Knick.
snippet: There may be visible cringing in Phoenix on Friday night, when Amar’e Stoudemire, whom the Suns let go because of his knee, makes his first appearance as a Knick.
